name: Frok 3D Platformer
description:
Welcome! Your Frok is waiting for you. Are you ready for adventure with Frok?
Your task is to complete 45 different levels set in 9 different worlds.

1- Collect golden stars by jumping off platforms.
2- Increase Frok's maximum health by buying new items in his house.
3- Buy food and shampoo for care your Frok.
4- Take care your Frok to make him happy and have more lives.
5- You can customize your Frok house.
6- It has gliding mechanics. While the frog is in the air, you can give him direction.
